column1: Amnon was a Seer of the First Age.  His only recorded prophesy was "Great is the Fall of Gondolin"
column3: p. 172 which was quoted again by Turgon
column5: at the time the event took place.

column2: Amnon was the wicked eldest son of David.  J.R.R. Tolkien was surely aware of this character (as he was a Catholic)
column3: and it is curious to speculate on his particular choosing of this name
column4: as it was in his earlier works.
